overview.en: FashionTV has been established 20 years ago, and is the global leader in fashion, model, and luxury lifestyle TV, OTT, Mobile Apps reaching 500 millions homes over PayTV, 500 millions homes over SmartTV, 1.5 billions users of smartphones, and 10 millions TV sets in hotels, cafes, gyms, and public places. FashionTV is equally popular among the millennials as well as the affluent middle age population worldwide. FashionTV features up-to-date live reports from major fashion shows such as Dolce Gabbana, Versace, Victoria Secretâ€™s, organises many events, and is recognised as a very popular and credible authority in reporting on fashion, models, and luxury lifestyle. FTV Coin Deluxe will enable members to benefit from the wide network of FashionTV.  The models and their parents will be able to maximise their incomes from using f smart wallets,  blockchain and smart contracts, and affluent members will be able to engage in fashion through events and sponsorship, and have special exclusive discounts  and anonymity to many luxury products and events.
